products.title: white Shirt
products.description: Classic collar, full sleeves—polished enough for office wear, relaxed enough for smart-casual styles.

products.title: Black trouser
products.description: “These classic black trousers are designed with a sleek straight fit, offering both comfort and style. Made from premium quality fabric, they feature a smooth finish, mid-rise waist, and versatile design that pairs well with formal shirts or casual tees. Perfect for office wear, evening outings, or everyday sophistication.”

products.title: Mini Skirt
products.description: A skirt is a garment that hangs from the waist or hips and covers the lower body. Skirts can be described in many ways, including by their cut, length, material, and special features

products.description: Slim-fit stretchable denim jeans with a mid-rise waist. Stylish and durable for everyday wear.

products.title: Olive Green Hoodie
products.description: Comfortable fleece hoodie with front pocket and adjustable drawstring. Great for winter layering.

products.title: Checked Casual Shirt

products.description: Tailored-fit trousers for office and events. Made with wrinkle-resistant premium fabric.

products.title: Denim Jacket

products.title: Black Round Sunglasses
